Class ChecksGameController

java.lang.Object
com.example.lunalunera.model.ChecksGameController
public class ChecksGameController extends Object
This class checks the conditions in which the letter inserted is correct or not Besides that, it also has utility method which doesn't are in the GameController class

  • Constructor Details

    • ChecksGameController

      public ChecksGameController(SecretWord secretWord, SecretWord.BinaryWord binaryWord, javafx.scene.image.ImageView[] moonLives, javafx.scene.image.ImageView moonImageView, javafx.scene.control.TextField[] wordTextField)
      Method constructor
      Parameters:
      secretWord - The secret word which is the input of the user
      binaryWord - An array of booleans representing the guessed letters of the secret word
      moonLives - An array of 8 moons, representing the remaining tries of the user
      moonImageView - The image of the moon, which fades a little every wrong try
      wordTextField - An array of text field in which the letters are guessed

      A get method for the intCounterHelp attribute
      Returns:
      an int which says the helps used by the user

      Returns:
      an array of booleans for the fields with wrong letters

    • setIsGameEndedAlready

      public void setIsGameEndedAlready(boolean trueOrFalse)
      A set method which assigns a boolean to the attribute which represents the state of the game, so the alert of victory/lose can appear
      Parameters:
      trueOrFalse - a boolean which indicates if the game ended or not

    • getIsGameEndedAlready

      public boolean getIsGameEndedAlready()
      A get method whitch returns a boolean for the attribute which represents the state of the game, so the alert of victory/lose can appear
      Returns:
      a boolean which indicates if the game ended or not

      Method which sets an error image in the display of the available tries

    • isGameEnded

      public boolean isGameEnded()
      Method which verifies if all the letters are guessed or if the failed attempts are equals or more than 9, which means the user lost the game
      Returns:
      a boolean which says if the game has ended or not

    • setMoonPhase

      public void setMoonPhase()
      Method which sets the moon image depending on the number of failed attempts at guessing the secret word

    • isACorrectAnswer

      public boolean isACorrectAnswer(String answer, int index)
      Method which verifies is a letter is one of the letters of the secret word and if that letters is already found
      Parameters:
      answer - letter being verified, a string
      index - The position of the letter at the word which should be in the text field
      Returns:
      it returns true if the letter is in the secret word, false if not or is already found
